MessageType.Documentation: Sent from nodes up to controller as they work through things. We use this to detect progress within the current round, and to simultaneously collect the results.

Scalar.name: round
Scalar.Documentation: The current round this progress is talking about (mainly for sanity checks)

Scalar.name: version
Scalar.Documentation: Used to detect freshness of progress, so that out of order messages are discarded.

Scalar.name: maxDistance
Scalar.Documentation: Longest distance seen in this round

Scalar.name: sumDistance
Scalar.Documentation: Sum of all distances in this round.

MessageType.Documentation: Shares a new distance update with connected nodes

Scalar.name: round
Scalar.Documentation: The current round this progress is talking about (mainly for sanity checks)

Scalar.name: distance
Scalar.Documentation: Distance of sending node from the source for the current round

MessageType.Documentation: Sent to start the next round

Scalar.name: round
Scalar.Documentation: Round that is currently starting, and also the id of the source for that round.

Scalar.name: index
Scalar.Documentation: The contiguous index of the graph node

Scalar.name: degree
Scalar.Documentation: Number of outgoing edges for this node.

Scalar.name: distDirty
Scalar.Documentation: Current distance has changed, but we haven't told neighbours yet.

Scalar.name: progressDirty
Scalar.Documentation: Number of messages sent or recevied has changed.
